HPI 8021 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1992 JTC Series 3rd/4th Place T. Kristensen/K. Shimizu

1992 was Tom Kristensen's first year competing in the JTC series. With teammate Kazuo Shimizu they secured the runner-up spot for the Object T team Skyline, finishing in the top 5 in every event. An impressive result that put Kristensen in 3rd overall and Shimizu in 4th overall. Unfortunately this would be Kristensen's (and Shimizu's) best results in the JTC series. See above for their 1993 season results.

In case you're wondering, AXIA was a Japanese line of high quality audio cassettes (!!) produced by Fuji. I think they should have gone with the Hello Kitty theme instead of the fluorescent splotches:
